## EventTypeOf type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EventTypeOf<EventMap extends DefaultEventMap, EventValue extends EventMap[keyof EventMap]> = {
    [EventType in keyof EventMap]: EventMap[EventType] extends EventValue ? EventType : never;
}[keyof EventMap];
```
